definitions.definition: A presentation of a series of photographic slides , usually with a spoken or recorded explanation.
Any sequence of images, shown one after the other (not simultaneously).

subdefinitions.definition: The situation where a game has a low frame rate due to insufficient computing power.
examples: When there are too many enemies, the whole thing just turns into a slideshow .

main_definition: A presentation of a series of photographic slides , usually with a spoken or recorded explanation.
secondary_definitions: Any sequence of images, shown one after the other (not simultaneously).
